subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The 2006 World Cup second-round match between Brazil and Ghana was influenced by an Asian betting syndicate, according to an article in Monday’s editions of Der Spiegel, a German magazine.
snippet: The 2006 World Cup second-round match between Brazil and Ghana was influenced by an Asian betting syndicate, according to an article in Monday’s editions of Der Spiegel, a German magazine.
